item.title: Buno's gliding activity with Tableau Software
Where did Buno's pilots fly in 2019 with Folium
item.description: After compiling all the countryside flights performed by Buno’s member in 2019, I was able to obtain a heat map of the most visited places and used paths. The center of the Ile-de-France region clearly stands out, as is it a forbidden area for us, glider pilots. Our main playground seems to be located between the cities of Alençon and Le Mans on the West, Reims and Troyes on the East, and the Loire river on the south.
